definitions.definition: The act of excommunicating , disfellowshipping or ejecting ; especially an ecclesiastical censure whereby the person against whom it is pronounced is, for the time, cast out of the communication of the church; exclusion from fellowship in things spiritual.

main_definition: The act of excommunicating , disfellowshipping or ejecting ; especially an ecclesiastical censure whereby the person against whom it is pronounced is, for the time, cast out of the communication of the church; exclusion from fellowship in things spiritual.
